items.question: What should healthcare providers wear?
items.answer: White coats, scrubs, or professional attire all work well. We recommend whatever your providers typically wear when seeing patients.

items.question: Do these meet ID badge requirements?
items.answer: Yes. Our photos can be exported in the specific formats and resolutions required for ID badge systems.

items.question: How do we handle rotating residents?
items.answer: Send invite links as part of your onboarding process. Residents can submit photos before they even start.

items.question: Can we use these for insurance credentialing?
items.answer: Yes. Our professional headshots meet the standards required by insurance panels and credentialing organizations.

items.question: Do you offer enterprise pricing for health systems?
items.answer: Yes. We offer volume discounts for healthcare organizations with 50+ providers. Contact us for custom pricing.
